My Education

My degree, courseworks, and projects in the university

B.Eng in Industrial Engineering (First Class Honor)

I have graduated with Bachelor's Degree from the faculty of Engineering, Chulalongkorn University. You can check out my resume here.

COURSEWORKS

You can check out some of my projects in the university below.

Studying factors affecting roses' growth

Design of Experiment

This project aimed to study the effect of solutions to the growth rate of a rose. We used three kinds of solutions, namely water, syrup, and vinegar. We then took a photo from the top view of a roses everyday and calculate the difference in surface area of a rose as growth rate.

Lottery Database

Database Engineering

The goal of this project was to simulate a webpage of buying lotteries. In this project, My responsibility in the team was to create a database used to store the data of customers and transactions.

The Effect of PAT3 Simulation Test on the Real PAT3 Scores

Engineering Statistics

This project aimed to analyse the quality of the PAT3 Simulation Test created by the FECamp club. In this study, we used descriptive statistics and hypothesis testing to test whether a student who performs well in the simulation test will also receive high score in the real PAT3 test.
